name: On Your Left
description:
!!!  CONTIANS A JUMPSCARE  !!!

CONTROLS:

- Use the mouse to look left and right (by going to the edges)

- Click with the mouse to trigger actions on different objects

GUIDE (SPOILERS):

- Counter the overheating by clicking on the fan when its not on (it will not spin, it won't make a sound and it's light will be red)

- Counter the Thing by clicking on the door it comes from when it's open

- Turn the light on by clicking on the lightbulb when it's off

CREDITS:

- Made by ne_mene in Love2D

This is my first horror game so I hope it doesn't suck too bad
